entry.title: Sexy Magic Intimate Skin Serum
entry.summary:
Vendor: Geti Cosmetics
Type: Skin Serum
Price: 24.00

We moisturize every other inch of our skin…why not “down there”? After all, it’s skin like any other — subject to damage, age & gravity.Give your naughty bits some love! A natural blend of 100% plant-based oils that moisturize and rejuvenate intimate skin. 

Features + Benefits

  • Rejuvenate Your Intimate Skin – a little moisture goes a long way in restoring youthful elasticity and colour.
  • Made with 100% Genital-Safe Oils.
  • Unisex Formula – perfect for men and women.
  • 1oz blue glass bottle with lid.

How to use

Rub a quarter-sized drop of oil between your hands and gently apply to clean genital skin. 

Designed for external use. Not a lubricant.

Ingredients

Organic Camellia Oil, Organic Evening Primrose

entry.title: DAMAGED PACKAGING - Lover's Oil
entry.summary:
Vendor: Province Apothecary
Type: Sexual Wellness
Price: 10.00 - 16.00 (2 variants)

*Labels are a little loose. Still unopened, contents perfect*

Our all-natural massage oil is the best way to have fun in the bedroom! We’ve blended 10 of the most sensual essential oils into a non-toxic rich and moisturizing base for a heightened aromatherapy experience to bring you and your lover closer together.

Rose Absolute | An exotic essential oil used for centuries in perfuming for it’s complex, sweet floral scent. 

Cedarwood Oil | Soft, woodsy scent that comforts and grounds the mind to instill confidence and self-assurance.

Ingredients

Fractionated Coconut Oil*, Sunflower Seed Oil*, Cedarwood Oil*, Jojoba Seed Oil, Evening Primrose Oil*, Vitamin E, Bergamot Fcf Oil, Ylang Ylang Oil*, Clary Sage Oil*, Rose Geranium Flower Oil, Jasmine Oil, Cardamon Oil, Rosemary Leaf Extract*, Rose Absolute Oil, Vetiver Oil*. *Certified Organic ingredients

Directions

Use generously and massage into skin where desired. For external use only. Do not use with latex products. This product has a shelf life of 6 months after opening.
